title: Cassoulet of cannellini beans, duck and Toulouse sausage
ingredients: ['2 tbsp olive oil', '3 fresh Toulouse or merguez sausages', '2 skinless duck breast fillets, cut into bite-sized chunks', '125g bacon lardons', '1 onion, chopped', '3 garlic cloves, crushed', '400g can cannellini beans, drained and rinsed', '400g can chopped tomatoes with herbs', '2 sprigs of fresh thyme']
